00180 
00182 #define CRC_INIT_DEFAULT                                              \
00183 {                                                                     \
00184   crcWidth16,           /* CRC width is 16 bits. */                   \
00185   0x00008408UL,         /* Polynomial value of IEEE 802.15.4-2006. */ \
00186   0x00000000UL,         /* Initialization value. */                   \
00187   8U,                   /* 8 bits per word. */                        \
00188   crcByteOrderNormal,   /* Byte order is normal. */                   \
00189   crcBitOrderLSBFirst,  /* Bit order (TBD). */                        \
00190   crcBitReverseNormal,  /* Bit order is not reversed on output. */    \
00191   false,                /* No zero-padding. */                        \
00192   false,                /* Input is not inverted. */                  \
00193   false                 /* Output is not inverted. */                 \
00194 }

00279 __STATIC_INLINE bool CRC_BusyGet(void)
00280 {
00281   return (bool)((CRC->STATUS & _CRC_STATUS_BUSY_MASK)
00282                 >> _CRC_STATUS_BUSY_SHIFT);
00283 }
